Properties

deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0242 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
P Physician (osteopath, homeopath)Physician (osteopath, homeopath)
R PharmacistPharmacist
M Mid-level professional (nurse, nurse practitioner, physician's assistant)Mid-level professional (nurse, nurse practitioner, physician's assistant)
H Other health professionalOther health professional
C Health care consumer/patientHealth care consumer/patient
L Lawyer/attorneyLawyer/attorney
O Other non-health professionalOther non-health professional

name: PrimaryObserverQualification
title: primaryObserverQualification
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to provide a general description of the kind of health care professional who provided the primary observation.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PEO and PCR segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0242 (Primary Observer's Qualification)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Mid-level professional (nurse, nurse practitioner, physician's assistant)
concept.definition: Mid-level professional (nurse, nurse practitioner, physician's assistant)
